title.rendered: Level Up Your Tech Interview with Abhinav

content.rendered:
Technical interviews are opportunities to showcase your problem-solving abilities. Abhinav Srivastava, Head of Human Resources at Millennium, India, offers tips on how to prepare for your next tech interview.

  1. Brush up on your fundamentals.
  2. Be prepared to talk through code live.
  3. Stay updated with industry trends.
  4. Showcase how you handle feedback.

excerpt.rendered: Technical interviews are opportunities to showcase your problem-solving abilities. Abhinav Srivastava, Head of Human Resources at Millennium, India, offers tips on how to prepare for your next tech interview.
